message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,000,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,000,000 is unfortunately out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for this product.  This is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $925,000.
Alice,  $925,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $850,000.  This is a good price for both of us and allows us to close the deal.
